entry.title: Simple step one for quantum
entry.summary: Christopher Allen shared a link about interesting research on Fri, Apr 8, 2022 at 4:33 PM. The link provided is related to a particular approach and can be found at https://ntruprime.cr.yp.to/software.html. Additionally, he also shared what he believes to be the original academic paper at https://eprint.iacr.org/2021/826.pdf.
